definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
38th parallel/dividing line agreed at Yalta between US and Soviet zones of influence in Korea, now the DMZ between North and South Korea

sentences.english: Potassium lies one octave from sodium.
Ceiling fans help to circulate the air, keeping the air temperature 3-8 degrees cooler.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇能流通空氣，使空氣溫度降低三到八度。

sentences.english: It has a deep range beginning about three octaves below middle C.
sentences.chinese: 它有始於中音以下三個八度音階的深度範圍。

sentences.english: Learn these riffs in different octaves.
Ascending octaves double the frequency of the lower note.
sentences.chinese: 高八度的振動頻率是低音的兩倍。

sentences.english: A laser light that spans an octave enables certain very useful tricks.
sentences.chinese: 橫跨一個八度的雷射光可以延伸出一些很有用的技術。

sentences.english: This is, however, true of this octave of densities .
sentences.chinese: 然而，在這個八度音程宇宙中是真實的。

sentences.english: This sound spectrum spans about ten octaves.
sentences.chinese: 這個聲譜約有十個八度的跨度。

sentences.english: Its range is generally five octaves and three-eighths.
sentences.chinese: 一般按四五度定弦，音域三個八度。

sentences.english: Some insects hear ultrasonic sounds two octaves higher than humans can.
sentences.chinese: 某些昆蟲比人類能聽高兩個八度的超音速聲音。

sentences.english: Remember the other people, the octaves had been enunciated, the triads had been enunciated.
sentences.chinese: 記住其他人，八度音也曾發明過，三元組也被發現過。

sentences.english: It sounds like there's a subtle octavia sound going on.
sentences.chinese: 它聽起來好像有一點點很細微的八度音的音色。

sentences.english: A standard guitar sounds one octave below pitch as written in standard notation.
sentences.chinese: 一把標準吉他實際音高比譜面低一個八度。

sentences.english: Unto the end, in verses, a psalm for David, for the octave.
sentences.chinese: 達味詩歌，交與樂官，和以絃樂，八度低音。

sentences.english: The range consists of three octaves.
sentences.chinese: 二胡的音域有三個八度。

sentences.english: Full range adjustments from one semitone to an octave up or down.
sentences.chinese: 全方位的調整，從一個半音，以一個八度向上或向下。

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
